segments.text: I notice the cookie jar, and I can’t believe the boy is going to such lengths to get a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is almost empty, and he’s still reaching for more like it’s the last one on earth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to tip that stool over any second, but he doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, waiting for her share, but she’s not helping him at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless they’re being, especially with the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but she’s completely clueless about what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve ever been caught doing something like this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate he’s holding is probably going to be full of cookies, but he’s going to fall before he gets there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how determined he is, even though it’s dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just asking for trouble, and they’re the ones causing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to stop them before they hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR
